ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Specify the adverse events th
ReferenceDocuments.description: Specify the adverse events that the site classified incorrectly as DLTs:

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 100
ReferenceDocuments.description: If no, identify the adverse events which are classified as DLTs, that should NOT have been classified as DLTs, according to the protocol specifications.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If no above, identify adverse events which are not DLTs  according to protocol specifications:

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 001
ReferenceDocuments.description: If no, identify the adverse events which are classified as DLTs, that should NOT have been classified as DLTs, according to the protocol specifications:

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Please discuss the disagreements between Study Chair's assessment and institution's assessment that are not expected to be resolved
